actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to permit regulation of automated blood pressure machines to insure the accuracy and reliability of their performance.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to classify automated blood pressure machines as class II medical devices under the Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, notwithstanding requirements under such Act for the classification of a medical device as a class II medical device.

titles.title: A bill to permit regulation of automated blood pressure machines to insure the accuracy and reliability of their performance.
